tooltips.clearChat: Clear chat, [ctrl+clik] = clear all, [shift+click] = clear PI logs
tooltips.afk: Toggle yourself as AFK, ctrl+click to edit message
tooltips.rmvDJ: Skip and remove the DJ from booth

log.preRelease: This is a pre-release, expect bugs!!
log.bgPrompt:
Image URL:
Type:
"reset" default script background
"default" default plug background
log.forcingReload: An update is available, forcing you to reload. Sorry for the inconvenience.
log.updateAvailable:
An update is available:
%%WHATSNEW%%

Click here to reload.

warn.confirmSkip: This will skip the DJ, click again to confirm.
warn.confirmEject: This will remove the DJ from the wait-list, click again to confirm.
warn.isTrusted: Never execute code from someone you don't fully trust! Click here to confirm and execute code.
warn.djInHistory:
%%DJ%% is playing a song in history :
Author : %%AUTHOR%% 
Title : %%TITLE%%
Played by : %%HISTORYDJ%% %%TURNS%% song(s) ago. %%SKIP%%
warn.fastBan: This will perma-ban the user, click this once to validate.
warn.leaving: [Plug-It] Navigation warn: Are you sure you want to leave ?
warn.boothAlert: Booth alert : You will be playing in %%POS%% turn, make sure to pick a song!
warn.nextMediaInHistory: Your next media is in the room history!
warn.possibleDuplicate:
This could be a duplicate (based on author/name):
%%AUTHOR%% - %%TITLE%%
%%NAME1%% - %%NAME2%%
warn.unlistedCommand:
This command is not listed because it can break your playlists!
Please, backup all of them before attempting to do this command again.
This can and will probably spam your chat!
Type the command again or click this message to confirm.

error.noUserByName: They are no user by this name
error.noLastMention: Could not find your last mention.
error.noSufficentPermissions: You do not have sufficent permissions.
error.staffKick: You can't kick user with greater or equal rank than you.
error.staffBan: You can't ban user with greater or equal rank than you.
error.cannotSkipFinished: The song you want to skip has finished playing!
error.cannotGrab: Cannot grab in current playlist, is it full ?
error.cannotGetMediaID: Could not get media ID, check console for more details.
error.APIFloodDetected: API flood detected! Deactivated the API and internal calls to it for 10s.
error.APIFLoodInEffect: This action is unavailable due to an API flood.

success.notGrabed: You can grab this song because you don't have it yet!
success.noDuplicates: Duplicate check finished: no results. Congrats!
success.noRenaming: No songs to rename, your playlists are clean!
success.noUnavailable: Unavailable song search finished! No broken songs found!

userchat.kicking: @%%USER%% you will be kicked for %%TIME%% seconds.
userchat.djSkip: @%%DJ%%, this song is in the DJ history!
userchat.inputDisabled: Turn off AFK responder to chat!

log in chat: true

move to top: true
move to bottom: false
delete unavailable songs: false

Move to top ?
